title: Adopt Textual CSS best practices (variables, accent colors)
description: Current CSS uses hardcoded colors throughout styles.tcss. Should adopt Textual conventions: define CSS variables for primary/accent colors, use Textual's built-in design system where appropriate, make theming easier.

title: Style QuestionPrompt and SelectionPrompt to match app aesthetic
description: QuestionPrompt and SelectionPrompt (permissions) look like default Textual widgets rather than matching our dark theme with cyan/green accents. They should use the app's visual language.
